channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat, Inc. -- jboss-remoting
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat, Inc. -- jboss-remoting

item.title: CVE-2018-1041|2024-08-05T03:44:11.948Z -- red%20hat%2C%20inc. -- jboss-remoting
item.description: A vulnerability was found in the way RemoteMessageChannel, introduced in jboss-remoting versions 3.3.10, reads from an empty buffer. An attacker could use this flaw to cause denial of service via high CPU caused by an infinite loop.
